title: HTTP Schema Resource
description: A resource detailing the HTTP methods supported by a resource along with links to a schema describing that resource and a linked data description of the resource.

responses.description: A dictionary of valid HttpResponseEntity for the request, by HTTP response code.

HttpRequestEntity.description: The entity that must be provided with the request.

EntityContent.description: An object whose property keys are MIME types and property values are objects describing the MIME type.

EntityContentType.description: Details about resources defining and/or describing a specific entity content type.

context.description: If the entity may be mapped into RDF, this property **MUST** be the URL of a resource defning how to map the entity to RDF statemensts. For example, the URL of a JSON-LD context.

schema.description: If the entity is described by a schema defining valid and/or expected content of the entity, this property **MUST** be the URL of a resource defining the schema for the entity. For example, a JSON Schema.
